Activity: Log in, check emails and prepare for the final review of the UI/UX improvements.
Final Presentation and Review with @LDES-1 and @PROD-1. Present the updated HUD and menu system designs. Address any remaining concerns and obtain final approval.

Based on the final approval, prepare all design assets and documentation for handoff to the client developers (@CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, @CDEV-3). Organize files and create clear instructions for implementation.

Meet with @CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, @CDEV-3 to officially hand off the UI/UX design assets and answer any questions they may have regarding implementation. Review the documentation and provide guidance as needed. @CDEV-1, @CDEV-2, @CDEV-3 Subject: UI/UX Design Asset Handoff
Begin planning for the next iteration of UI/UX improvements. Review player feedback and identify areas where further enhancements are needed.
Catch up on industry news and articles related to UI/UX design for games. Explore new tools and techniques that could be applied to future projects. Maybe browse Dribbble for cool inspirations.

Document all the learnings and challenges from the UI/UX enhancements this week. Write a short summary report for @LDES-1 and @PROD-1 outlining the progress made and the lessons learned. This also helps prepare for future sprints. @LDES-1, @PROD-1 Subject: UI/UX Enhancement Summary Report - Week 4
